mapper.insert: INSERT INTO success_seckilleds (seckill_id, user_id, seckill_at, state) VALUES (#{seckilledId}, #{userId}, #{seckillAt}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_id, sk.verification_code, sk.exchange_time, sk.state, sk.seckill_at, sk.created_at, s.id "seckill.id", s.merchat_id "seckill.merchat_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.logo "seckill.logo", s.describe "seckill.describe", s.integral "seckill.integral", s.examine "seckill.examine", s.publish "seckill.publish", s.images "seckill.images", s.total "seckill.total", s.remain "seckill.remain", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.created_at "seckill.created_at" FROM success_seckilleds AS sk INNER JOIN seckills AS s ON sk.seckill_id = s.id WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckilledId} AND sk.user_id = #{userId};
